properties.displayName: Suspicious File Event With Teams Objects
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where (FolderPath contains "\\Microsoft\\Teams\\Cookies" or FolderPath contains "\\Microsoft\\Teams\\Local Storage\\leveldb") and (not(InitiatingProcessFolderPath contains "\\Microsoft\\Teams\\current\\Teams.exe"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects an access to authentication tokens and accounts of Microsoft Teams desktop application.
